file.name: azure.com-automation-softwareUpdateConfiguration-2017-05-15-preview-swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    name: Mohamed Enein
  description: APIs for managing software update configurations.
  title: Update Management
  version: 2017-05-15-preview
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - cloud
  x-logo:
    url: https://assets.onestore.ms/cdnfiles/onestorerolling-1606-01000/shell/v3/images/logo/microsoft.png
  x-origin:
    - format: swagger
      url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/azure-rest-api-specs/master/specification/automation/resource-manager/Microsoft.Automation/preview/2017-05-15-preview/softwareUpdateConfiguration.json
      version: "2.0"
  x-providerName: azure.com
  x-serviceName: automation-softwareUpdateConfiguration
  x-tags:
    - Azure
    - Microsoft
security:
  - azure_auth:
      - user_impersonation
paths:
  "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Automation/automationAccounts/{automationAccountName}/softwareUpdateConfigurations":
    get:
      description: Get all software update configurations for the account.
      externalDocs:
        url: http://aka.ms/azureautomationsdk/softwareupdateconfigurationoperations
      operationId: SoftwareUpdateConfigurations_List
      parameters:
        - description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft
            Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for
            every service call.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List software update configurations:
              value: 1a7d4044-286c-4acb-969a-96639265bf2e
            List software update configurations Targeting a specific azure virtual machine:
              value: 1a7d4044-286c-4acb-969a-96639265bf2e
        - description: Name of an Azure Resource group.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 1
            maxLength: 90
            pattern: ^[-\w\._]+$
          examples:
            List software update configurations:
              value: mygroup
            List software update configurations Targeting a specific azure virtual machine:
              value: mygroup
        - description: The name of the automation account.
          in: path
          name: automationAccountName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List software update configurations:
              value: myaccount
            List software update configurations Targeting a specific azure virtual machine:
              value: myaccount
        - description: Client Api Version.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List software update configurations:
              value: 2017-05-15-preview
            List software update configurations Targeting a specific azure virtual machine:
              value: 2017-05-15-preview
        - description: Identifies this specific client request.
          in: header
          name: clientRequestId
          required: false
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The filter to apply on the operation.
          in: query
          name: $filter
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List software update configurations Targeting a specific azure virtual machine:
              value: "properties/updateConfiguration/azureVirtualMachines/any(m: m eq
                '/subscriptions/1a7d4044-286c-4acb-969a-96639265bf2e/resourceGr\
                oups/myresources/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/vm\
                -01')"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Return list of software update configurations.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/softwareUpdateConfigurationListResult"
              examples:
                List software update configurations:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/List_software_update_configurations"
                List software update configurations Targeting a specific azure virtual machine:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/List_software_update_configurations_\
                    Targeting_a_specific_azure_virtual_machine"
        default:
          description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: Error response of an operation failure
                properties:
                  code:
                    description: Error code
                    type: string
                  message:
                    description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
                    type: string
                type: object
      tags:
        - Software Update Configuration
  "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Automation/automationAccounts/{automationAccountName}/softwareUpdateConfigurations/{softwareUpdateConfigurationName}":
    delete:
      description: delete a specific software update configuration.
      externalDocs:
        url: http://aka.ms/azureautomationsdk/softwareupdateconfigurationoperations
      operationId: SoftwareUpdateConfigurations_Delete
      parameters:
        - description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft
            Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for
            every service call.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete software update configuration:
              value: 51766542-3ed7-4a72-a187-0c8ab644ddab
        - description: Name of an Azure Resource group.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 1
            maxLength: 90
            pattern: ^[-\w\._]+$
          examples:
            Delete software update configuration:
              value: mygroup
        - description: The name of the automation account.
          in: path
          name: automationAccountName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete software update configuration:
              value: myaccount
        - description: The name of the software update configuration to be created.
          in: path
          name: softwareUpdateConfigurationName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete software update configuration:
              value: mypatch
        - description: Client Api Version.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete software update configuration:
              value: 2017-05-15-preview
        - description: Identifies this specific client request.
          in: header
          name: clientRequestId
          required: false
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The software update configuration has been deleted.
        "204":
          description: The software update configuration does not exist.
        default:
          description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: Error response of an operation failure
                properties:
                  code:
                    description: Error code
                    type: string
                  message:
                    description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
                    type: string
                type: object
      tags:
        - Software Update Configuration
    get:
      description: Get a single software update configuration by name.
      externalDocs:
        url: http://aka.ms/azureautomationsdk/softwareupdateconfigurationoperations
      operationId: SoftwareUpdateConfigurations_GetByName
      parameters:
        - description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft
            Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for
            every service call.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get software update configuration by name:
              value: 51766542-3ed7-4a72-a187-0c8ab644ddab
        - description: Name of an Azure Resource group.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 1
            maxLength: 90
            pattern: ^[-\w\._]+$
          examples:
            Get software update configuration by name:
              value: mygroup
        - description: The name of the automation account.
          in: path
          name: automationAccountName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get software update configuration by name:
              value: myaccount
        - description: The name of the software update configuration to be created.
          in: path
          name: softwareUpdateConfigurationName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get software update configuration by name:
              value: mypatch
        - description: Client Api Version.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get software update configuration by name:
              value: 2017-05-15-preview
        - description: Identifies this specific client request.
          in: header
          name: clientRequestId
          required: false
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A single software update configuration.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/softwareUpdateConfiguration"
              examples:
                Get software update configuration by name:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_software_update_configuration_by\
                    _name"
        default:
          description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: Error response of an operation failure
                properties:
                  code:
                    description: Error code
                    type: string
                  message:
                    description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
                    type: string
                type: object
      tags:
        - Software Update Configuration
    put:
      description: Create a new software update configuration with the name given in the
        URI.
      externalDocs:
        url: http://aka.ms/azureautomationsdk/softwareupdateconfigurationoperations
      operationId: SoftwareUpdateConfigurations_Create
      parameters:
        - description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft
            Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for
            every service call.
          in: path
          name: subscriptionId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Create software update configuration:
              value: 51766542-3ed7-4a72-a187-0c8ab644ddab
        - description: Name of an Azure Resource group.
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 1
            maxLength: 90
            pattern: ^[-\w\._]+$
          examples:
            Create software update configuration:
              value: mygroup
        - description: The name of the automation account.
          in: path
          name: automationAccountName
          required: true
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Create software update configuration:
              value: myaccount
        - description: The name of the software update configuration to be created.
          in: path
          name: softwareUpdateConfigurationName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Create software update configuration:
              value: testpatch
        - description: Client Api Version.
          in: query
          name: api-version
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Create software update configuration:
              value: 2017-05-15-preview
        - description: Identifies this specific client request.
          in: header
          name: clientRequestId
          required: false
          x-ms-parameter-location: method
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/softwareUpdateConfiguration"
        description: Request body.
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Software update configuration with the same name and properties
            already exists.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/softwareUpdateConfiguration"
              examples:
                Create software update configuration:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Create_software_update_configuration"
        "201":
          description: Software update configuration is created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/softwareUpdateConfiguration"
              examples:
                Create software update configuration:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Create_software_update_configuration"
        default:
          description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: Error response of an operation failure
                properties:
                  code:
                    description: Error code
                    type: string
                  message:
                    description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
                    type: string
                type: object
      tags:
        - Software Update Configuration
servers:
  - url: https://management.azure.com/
components:
  examples:
    List_software_update_configurations:
      value:
        value:
          - id: /subscriptions/1a7d4044-286c-4acb-969a-96639265bf2e/resourceGroups/Mo-Resources-WCUS/providers/Microsoft.Automation/automationAccounts/Mo-AAA-WCUS/softwareUpdateConfigurations/testpatch-01
            name: testpatch-01
            properties:
              creationTime: 2017-10-19T18:54:50.5233333+00:00
              frequency: Week
              lastModifiedTime: 2017-10-19T18:54:50.68+00:00
              nextRun: 2017-10-23T12:22:00-07:00
              provisioningState: Succeeded
              startTime: 2017-10-19T12:22:00-07:00
              tasks:
                postTask:
                  source: GetCache
                preTask:
                  parameters:
                    COMPUTERNAME: Computer1
                  source: HelloWorld
              updateConfiguration:
                azureVirtualMachines:
                  - /subscriptions/1a7d4044-286c-4acb-969a-96639265bf2e/resourceGroups/myresources/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/vm-01

                  - /subscriptions/1a7d4044-286c-4acb-969a-96639265bf2e/resourceGroups/myresources/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/vm-03

                        - /subscriptions/422b6c61-95b0-4213-b3be-7282315df71d/resourceGroups/a-stasku-rg0

                            - tag2Value2

  securitySchemes:
    azure_auth:
      description: Azure Active Directory OAuth2 Flow
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        implicit:
          authorizationUrl: https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/authorize
          scopes:
            user_impersonation: impersonate your user account
  schemas:
    AdvancedSchedule:
      description: The properties of the create Advanced Schedule.
      properties:
        monthDays:
          description: Days of the month that the job should execute on. Must be between 1
            and 31.
          items:
            format: int32
            type: integer
            nullable: false
          type: array
        monthlyOccurrences:
          description: Occurrences of days within a month.
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/AdvancedScheduleMonthlyOccurrence"
          type: array
        weekDays:
          description: Days of the week that the job should execute on.
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
    AdvancedScheduleMonthlyOccurrence:
      description: The properties of the create advanced schedule monthly occurrence.
      properties:
        day:
          description: Day of the occurrence. Must be one of monday, tuesday, wednesday,
            thursday, friday, saturday, sunday.
          enum:
            - Monday
            - Tuesday
            - Wednesday
            - Thursday
            - Friday
            - Saturday
            - Sunday
          type: string
          x-ms-enum:
            modelAsString: true
            name: ScheduleDay
        occurrence:
          description: Occurrence of the week within the month. Must be between 1 and 5
          format: int32
          type: integer
    AzureQueryProperties:
      description: Azure query for the update configuration.
      properties:
        locations:
